episode.title: The M Is for Magnificent
episode.rawTitle: 380: ‘The M Is for Magnificent’, With Matthew Panzarino
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Matthew Panzarino returns to the show for a post-WWDC discussion about Vision Pro and VisionOS.
episode.showNotes:
Matthew Panzarino returns to the show for a post-WWDC discussion about Vision Pro and VisionOS.
